hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path of time.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 4 Top

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: Can't find an item? Scan an Amiibo.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##Dodongo's Cavern## has #1# major item.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a spider under a #crate in the crater# holds #a Blue Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #an Ice Trap#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found at #Zora's River#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #the Shadow Temple Boss Key#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Falling Spikes Upper Chest

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #Lon Lon Ranch# is a foolish choice.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Red Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Heart Container#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Bomb Bag#.
hinted_locations: Forest Temple Raised Island Courtyard Chest

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Graveyard# is a foolish choice.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #inside Ganon's Castle#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Zora's Fountain# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that plundering #the Ice Cavern# is a foolish choice.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Zora Tunic# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Strength Upgrade#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Saria's Song#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that in #Gerudo Valley# the hammer unlocks #a Deku Stick#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Red Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #Epona's Song#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Early Torches Chest

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Saria's Song#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that inside the #lakeside lab# a person and a spider hold...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #an Ice Trap#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# is on the path to #the Key#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that racing #Damp's ghost# rewards...^ #a Huge Rupee# and #Magic Beans#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that ##the Forest Temple## has #1# major item.

ToT (Right).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Shadow Temple#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: That's a nice wall you got there. Would be a shame if I just... clipped right through that.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Strength Upgrade#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that a #storm within Zora's Domain# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Heart Container#.
